articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Just look at Ayaneo's absolute unit of a Windows gaming "handheld" - Ars Technica
articles.description: The Ayaneo Next II pushes past 3 pounds, 13 inches wide, and costs up to $4,300.

articles.title: Instagram and YouTube owners built 'addiction machines', trial told - BBC
articles.description: The tech giants are under scrutiny over social media addiction in a landmark jury trial in Los Angeles
articles.content: Over the course of the next several weeks, there will be testimony from experts, family members of children who died, and by Zuckerberg, Adam Mosseri, the head of Instagram, and Neal Mohan, the CEO o… [+9 chars]

articles.title: A Simple Eating Schedule Cut Crohn’s Disease Activity by 40% - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Simply changing when you eat—not how much—may significantly calm Crohn’s disease symptoms and inflammation. A new randomized controlled trial funded by the Crohn’s & Colitis Foundation reports that time-restricted feeding, a type of intermittent fasting, led …
articles.content: Eating on a schedulenot eating lessmay make a big difference for people with Crohns disease. A new randomized clinical trial found that time-restricted feeding, where all meals are eaten within an 8-… [+4933 chars]
